an11.12:1.1: Ekam samayam bhagava sakkesu viharati kapilavatthusmim nigrodharame.
an11.12:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena mahanamo sakko gilana vutthito hoti aciravutthito gelanna.
an11.12:1.3: Tena kho pana samayena sambahula bhikkhu bhagavato civarakammam karonti:
an11.12:2.4: Atha kho mahanamo sakko yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinno kho mahanamo sakko bhagavantam etadavoca:
an11.12:2.8: Tesam no, bhante, nanaviharehi viharatam kenassa viharena vihatabban”ti?
an11.12:3.2: Etam kho, mahanama, tumhakam patirupam kulaputtanam yam tumhe tathagatam upasankamitva puccheyyatha:
an11.12:3.3: ‘tesam no, bhante, nanaviharehi viharatam kenassa viharena vihatabban’ti?
an11.12:3.4: Saddho kho, mahanama, aradhako hoti, no assaddho;
an11.12:3.9: Imesu kho tvam, mahanama, pancasu dhammesu patitthaya cha dhamme uttari bhaveyyasi.
an11.12:4.2: ‘itipi so bhagava …pe… sattha devamanussanam buddho bhagava’ti.
an11.12:4.3: Yasmim, mahanama, samaye ariyasavako tathagatam anussarati, nevassa tasmim samaye ragapariyutthitam cittam hoti, na dosapariyutthitam cittam hoti, na mohapariyutthitam cittam hoti;
an11.12:4.4: ujugatamevassa tasmim samaye cittam hoti tathagatam arabbha.
an11.12:4.5: Ujugatacitto kho pana, mahanama, ariyasavako labhati atthavedam, labhati dhammavedam, labhati dhammupasamhitam pamojjam.
an11.12:4.6: Pamuditassa piti jayati, pitimanassa kayo passambhati, passaddhakayo sukham vediyati, sukhino cittam samadhiyati.
an11.12:4.7: Imam kho tvam, mahanama, buddhanussatim gacchantopi bhaveyyasi, thitopi bhaveyyasi, nisinnopi bhaveyyasi, sayanopi bhaveyyasi, kammantam adhitthahantopi bhaveyyasi, puttasambadhasayanam ajjhavasantopi bhaveyyasi.
an11.12:5.1: Puna caparam tvam, mahanama, dhammam anussareyyasi …pe…
an11.12:5.7: Yatharupaya saddhaya samannagata ta devata ito cuta tatthupapanna, mayhampi tatharupa saddha samvijjati.
an11.12:5.11: pannaya samannagata ta devata ito cuta tatthupapanna, mayhampi tatharupa panna samvijjati’ti.
an11.12:5.12: Yasmim, mahanama, samaye ariyasavako attano ca tasanca devatanam saddhanca silanca sutanca caganca pannanca anussarati, nevassa tasmim samaye ragapariyutthitam cittam hoti, na dosapariyutthitam cittam hoti, na mohapariyutthitam cittam hoti;
an11.12:5.13: ujugatamevassa tasmim samaye cittam hoti devata arabbha.
an11.12:5.14: Ujugatacitto kho pana, mahanama, ariyasavako labhati atthavedam, labhati dhammavedam, labhati dhammupasamhitam pamojjam.
an11.12:5.15: Pamuditassa piti jayati, pitimanassa kayo passambhati, passaddhakayo sukham vediyati, sukhino cittam samadhiyati.
an11.12:5.16: Imam kho tvam, mahanama, devatanussatim gacchantopi bhaveyyasi, thitopi bhaveyyasi, nisinnopi bhaveyyasi, sayanopi bhaveyyasi, kammantam adhitthahantopi bhaveyyasi, puttasambadhasayanam ajjhavasantopi bhaveyyasi”ti.
